Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Ohio
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Chicago, Western, Grand & Damen, due to police activity near Damen/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Chicago, Western, Grand, then resume their normal route on Damen, due to police activity near Damen/Ohio.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clark/Wacker
ShortDescription: SB 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Wacker, LaSalle, Washington, then resume normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Wacker.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #22 Clark  buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Wacker, LaSalle, Washington, then resume normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Wacker.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
